Se hoče polastiti maminega denarja?
Nichelle Nichols ima s sinom viharen odnos. Zaradi demence je postal njen skrbnik.
04 Nov 2019, 20:34 by T. P.

Na lasvegaškem tradicionalnem srečanju ljubiteljev znanstvenofantastične serije Zvezdne steze sta ostarela igralka Nichelle Nichols in njen sin Kyle Johnson dajala vtis zadovoljne družine, čeprav je med njima grozljivo počilo pred komaj dvema mesecema. To je bil le epilog prvega poglavja pričkanja med mamo in sinom, ki naj bi se vleklo že najmanj dobro leto ter ga menda še ni konec. In kje je težava? Kyle je namreč po sodni poti postal mamin skrbnik, trdeč, da zaradi demence ne more več samostojno upravljati svojega premoženja. Nasprotno je Nichelle prepričana, da je to le premetena poteza, da se je znebi, jo strpa v dom za starostnike ter se okoristi z njenim denarjem.
2015. jo je zadela blažja kap.


Zvezdne steze so šle tja, kamor pred njimi še ni stopila človeška noga. FOTO: guliver/cover imagesguliver/cover images

Ostarela igralka se je proslavila z vlogo Nyoto Uhure, s katero je razbijala stereotipe in prestopala meje. Ko je 1966. dobila eno vidnejših vlog v Zvezdnih stezah, je postala ena prvih temnopoltih igralk, ki se jim je uspelo prebiti pred kamere ameriške televizije. Nato je še temeljito zatresla temelje tedanje družbe s poljubom s kapitanom Kirkom v podobi Williama Shatnerja, kar je bil prvi medrasni poljub na ameriški televiziji. A dnevi njene neodvisnosti, moči in samosvojosti so mimo, vajeti njenega življenja že nekaj let poskuša prevzeti njen edinec. Menda ker naj bi zvezdnici, ki bo decembra dopolnila 87 let, pošteno pešalo zdravje. Ne le da jo je 2015. zadela blažja kap, borila naj bi se tudi z izgubljanjem spomina zaradi demence, zaradi česar naj bi bila lahka tarča za vsakogar, ki bi jo želel izkoristiti in jo finančno molsti. Iz tega vidika naj bi Kyla skrbel predvsem materin menedžer Gilbert Bell. Tako je zvezdničin sin zaupal sodniku že maja lani in začel postopek, da bi postal njen pravni skrbnik in bil upravičen do sprejemanja vseh odločitev, povezanih z njenim premoženjem in zdravjem.


Nichelle in William Shatner sta pokrbela za prvi medrasni poljub na ameriški televiziji. FOTO: guliver/cover imagesguliver/cover images

Zaradi Kylovih skrbi je Nichelle že lani dobila štiri skrbnike – te je tedaj določilo sodišče –, zdaj pa naj bi to vlogo dobil Kyle, kar je, ko ji je maja letos pokazal papirje, sodu izbilo dno. "Nikamor ne grem! Želiš se me le znebiti. Jaz sem sama svoja šefica, ti nikakor nisi moj šef!" naj bi se drla na Kyla, kar je skrivaj uspelo posneti zvezdničinemu menedžerju, ki je avdioposnetek predal neki radijski postaji. In menda šokiral njene prijatelje. "Vedela sem, da njun odnos ni najboljši. A še nikoli nisem videla ali slišala, da bi Nichelle tako popustili živce, še na nikogar se ni nikoli tako drla. Zato se lahko le vprašam, kaj se dogaja za zaprtimi vrati," je dejala igralkina prijateljica Angelique Fawcette, ki je v sporu med mamo in sinom že od začetka na njeni strani.


Angelique se bori za prijateljico. FOTO: instagraminstagram

Angelique je takoj, ko je Kyle zagnal postopek za pridobitev pravnega skrbništva nad mamo, temu odločno nasprotovala. Že ves čas trdi, da Nichellin spomin sicer ni najboljši, a da to pač spada k njenim letom, ter da nikakor ni tako načet, kot trdi njen sin, in da nikoli ni videla znakov demence. Nadalje vztraja pri tem, da se želi Kyle le polastiti materinega denarja in jo strpati v dom za ostarele. "V tem trenutku so ji pravico do samostojnega odločanja iztrgali iz rok. To se zgodi, ko tvoje življenje prevzamejo skrbniki. Zanjo me skrbi prav vsak dan," je dejala Fawcettova, odločena, da se bo za prijateljico in njeno samostojnost in ponos borila do zadnjega. Podobno naj bi tudi igralkin menedžer poskušal doseči, da se Kylu odvzame vlogo njenega skrbnika.


Rada bi živela uspešno. In samostojno! FOTO: guliver/cover imagesguliver/cover images

Does he want to take his mother's money?
Nichelle Nichols has a stormy relationship with her son. Because of dementia, he became her caregiver.

At the traditional Las Vegas traditional meeting of fans of the science fiction series Star Trek, old actress Nichelle Nichols and her son Kyle Johnson gave the impression of a satisfied family, although the horror broke out just two months ago. This was only the epilogue of the first chapter of the wait between mother and son, which was supposed to drag on for at least a good year, and was probably not over. And where is the problem? Namely, Kyle became the mother's caretaker, claiming he could no longer independently manage his property because of dementia. By contrast, Nichelle is convinced that this is just a smart move to get rid of, put her in an old people's home and take advantage of her money.
In 2015, she was hit by a mild stroke.


The star trails went where the human foot had not yet entered. PHOTO: gulliver / cover imagesguliver / cover images

The aging actress became famous for her role as Nyoto Uhura, breaking stereotypes and crossing borders. When she got one of the more prominent roles in Star Trek in 1966, she became one of the first black actresses to break through to American television cameras. She then shook the foundations of the then-Kiss Company with Captain Kirk in the image of William Shatner, the first interracial kiss on American television. But the days of her independence, power and independence are over, she has been trying to take over her life for several years. Supposedly, since the star, who turns 87 in December, is expected to have a fair walk in health. Not only did she get a mild stroke in 2015, she also struggled with memory loss due to dementia, making it an easy target for anyone who wants to take advantage of it and beg her financially. From this perspective, Kyla is primarily concerned with her mother's manager Gilbert Bell. Thus, the star's son trusted the judge last May and began proceedings to become her legal guardian and to be entitled to make all decisions related to her property and health.


Nichelle and William Shatner made their first interracial kiss on American television. PHOTO: gulliver / cover imagesguliver / cover images

Because of Kyle's concerns, Nichelle got four trustees last year - appointed by the court at the time - but now Kyle is expected to get that role, which, when he showed her the papers in May, had broken the bottom. "I'm not going anywhere! You just want to get rid of me. I'm my own boss, you're by no means my boss!" they were supposed to be yelling at Kyla, which secretly managed to record the star's manager handing the audio over to a radio station. And apparently shocked her friends. "I knew their relationship was not the best. But I had never seen or heard Nichelle relent so much, she had never fought anyone like that before. So I can only wonder what's going on behind closed doors," she said. actress friend Angelique Fawcette, who has been in a dispute between mother and son on her side.


Angelique is fighting for a friend. PHOTO: instagraminstagram

As soon as Kyle instituted proceedings to obtain legal custody of her mother, Angelique strongly opposed this. She has always maintained that Nichell's memory is not the best, but that it belongs to her age, and that she is by no means as worn out as her son claims, and that she has never seen signs of dementia. She further insists that Kyle only wants to take away her mother's money and put her in a nursing home. "At that moment, she was taken out of her hands. It happens when your life is taken over by the caretakers. I care about her every day," said Fawcett, determined to fight for her friend and her independence and pride until the last one. Similarly, the actress' manager is trying to get Kylu to be deprived of her guardian role.
